text: Leave The World Behind is an upcoming feature film directed by Sam Esmail and adapted from Rumaan Alam's novel. It will star Julia Roberts, Mahershala Ali and Ethan Hawke. == Story == The literary basis of the script was Rumaan Alam's novel "Leave the World Behind", published in 2020. The main characters are a couple who decide to spend their vacation in a rented house in a remote part of Long Island. However, the owners of the house suddenly return and report that a disaster has occurred in New York. == References == Category:Movies based on books
title: Leave the World Behind (movie)
